pageContext.claim: “Bernie did us a lot of favors on social security. You saw that, where he, he revealed that Joe wanted to break up Social Security.”
pageContext.analysis: This claim is missing important context. In a long-ago budget battle, Biden once proposed a one-year freeze on all spending, including defense spending and social programs such as Social Security. Later he countered efforts to create private investment accounts by saying one could find savings in Social Security such as reducing the interest rate to calculate cost of living benefits or boosting the retirement age by a year.
